lead_paragraph: Corey Crawford stopped 25 shots for his league-leading seventh shutout, rookie Artemi Panarin and Andrew Shaw scored and the Chicago Blackhawks beat the St. Louis Blues 2-0 on Sunday night to end a two-game losing streak.

headline.print_headline: Crawford Gets 7th Shutout, Blackhawks Beat Blues 2-0
headline.main: Crawford Gets 7th Shutout, Blackhawks Beat Blues 2-0

snippet: Corey Crawford stopped 25 shots for his league-leading seventh shutout, rookie Artemi Panarin and Andrew Shaw scored and the Chicago Blackhawks beat the St. Louis Blues 2-0 on Sunday night to end a two-game losing streak....
